body:
handling errors with hooks may not have that straightforward/clear usage. Instead I would recommend using multiple sessions something like following:

You can run some ops at the end of training by using `end` function of `SessionRunHook`
```
with MonitoredTrainingSession(...) as mon_sess:
  while not mon_sess.should_stop():
    mon_sess.run(train_op)

with MonitoredTrainingSession(...) as mon_sess:
  while not mon_sess.should_stop():
    mon_sess.run(eval_op)
```

Please let us know this works or not
